str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Optative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Happy, blessed, to be envied. A prolonged form of the poetical makar; supremely blest; by extension, fortunate, well off.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From phobos; to frighten, i.e. to be alarmed; by analogy, to be in awe of, i.e. Revere.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
(a) fear, terror, alarm, (b) the object or cause of fear, (c) reverence, respect. From a primary phebomai; alarm or fright.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To disturb, agitate, stir up, trouble. Of uncertain affinity; to stir or agitate.
